title: My services
subtitle: Three simple and transparent offers. If your needs go beyond this scope, I also provide custom quotes.

standard.title: Showcase website + contact form
standard.description: A complete and professional website, including a contact form to receive emails.

features.item1: Modern, responsive design adapted to all screen sizes
features.item2: One or multiple pages (Home, About, Services, Contact, Gallery)
features.item3: Light animations and visual refinements aligned with your brand identity
features.item5: Deployment and assistance with domain name setup (yourbusiness.com / .fr)
features.item6: Local SEO optimisation to improve your online visibility

bilingual.title:
Showcase website + maintenance included
Optional FR / EN translation
bilingual.description: The most popular option: a professional showcase website with included maintenance time for stress-free updates.

features.item1: All features from the previous offer
features.item2: Minor updates package: 2 hours included (texts and photos)

admin.title: Self-managed website (admin access)
admin.description: A website designed to be fully managed by you, without any intervention from the provider.

features.item1: All features from the previous offer
features.item2: Secure admin area with personal access
features.item3: Independent editing of texts and images
features.item4: Customisable promotional banner, toggle on / off

updatesPolicy.title: Update policy
updatesPolicy.text: For showcase website offers, updates are handled simply by email. Depending on the selected package, some update time may be included. Beyond that, interventions are billed as a package: €100 minimum, then €50/hour.

custom.paragraph1: A redesign of your existing website or a specific need? Let’s discuss it together and I’ll provide a quote tailored to your activity.

legalNote: *Prices not subject to VAT according to article 293 B of the French General Tax Code
